<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Additional Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6268) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 188 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=241), [Undead Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=176) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Beastmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6267)

</column>

---

Another animal joins you in your travels. It is a young animal companion that has the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=653) trait. See Beastmaster Animal Companions for rules on how having multiple animal companions works.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once, gaining an additional animal companion each time, to a maximum of four total companions from all sources.
